name: hf-docker-space-cicd-test
description: 허깅페이스 Docker Spaces 배포 테스트 프로젝트

scripts.docker:build:run: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run
scripts.docker:stop: docker stop health-check-server 2>$null; docker rm health-check-server 2>$null; exit 0
scripts.test: curl http://localhost:7860/health || echo 'Server is not running. Run npm start first.'
scripts.health: curl -s http://localhost:7860/health | python -m json.tool || echo 'Server is not running. Run npm start first.'
scripts.deploy:info: echo 'Deploy to Hugging Face Spaces via GitHub Actions or manually push to HF Space repo'
